<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"required":true,"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","required":["name","owner_id","provider"],"properties":{"name":{"type":"string","pattern":"^[a-z0-9][a-z0-9-]{1,61}[a-z0-9]$","description":"Bucket name (DNS-compliant)"},"owner_id":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"provider":{"type":"string","enum":["S3","GCS","AZURE_BLOB","CUSTOM"]},"region":{"type":"string","description":"Storage region"},"encryption":{"type":"object","properties":{"enabled":{"type":"boolean","default":true},"kms_key_id":{"type":"string"}}},"versioning_enabled":{"type":"boolean","default":false}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
